name: The Hole Story
description: A girl aided by her trusty shovel embarks on a riddling quest to find a missing princess. Girls Make Games 2014 Grand Prize Winner!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game had little story, no introduction, and terrible controls. Looks cute, but don't be deceived.
